concept.title: Running Links from Maven
concept.shortdesc:
How to use Maven to run
.

section.p: To run Links via Maven, you can use the 'Maven AntRun' plugin to run the Ant task which is used to run Links. An example of how you can do this is shown in the following example section which you can add into the pom file for your project
